Keywords: X-Factor , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Scott Summers
Special Powers
TARGETING: Destroy Blocking
HELLFIRE GALA: Once per turn for all characters with this trait, when a friendly character with the X-Men keyword attacks and the attack roll includes exactly one 5, you may replace the other die with a 5.
HIGH FASHION: NO CUFFS ON JACKET AND SLEEVES THAT TURN INTO GLOVES: When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword hits and a 5-5 was rolled, after resolutions choose a friendly character with the X-Men keyword and remove an action token from that character.
INTERCEPTING BLASTS: Energy Shield/Deflection. // When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword within range is targeted by a range attack, modify their defense +1.

Comments
August 12, 2022
No-Name
I think Cyclops here is emblematic of the problem I have with the Hellfire pieces in general. They're all so... samey. The powers don't change as you click down the dial. The stats barely change as you click down the dial. The most you'll see is that one power will drop off for the last three clicks. And the fact that you have very long dials just makes these dials feel even more... blah, like as little thought as possible was put into these dials, contrasting strongly against how much thought was put into the Gala costume designs. Exciting outfits, boring dials.
